The balls on the clock point to the hour, 10/10 review if homo. Thats why I rate it 0/10. Totaly horrible. The game is full of cheaters and if someone kills you they are 100% cheating. If you have a friend that opens gloves in a case and he doesnt give them to you he is cheating. The average person judges thos based on the outside so If you look at this game you realize its uglier than golem from the hobbit. Boomstruck here owns a knife so he doesnt want to give you the real details, because if he does he will look like an idiot. A penguin can not flap its wings yet a ♥♥♥♥ing chicken in this game can kill you. Cluck Cluck Cluck, everytime i play inferno i see a ♥♥♥♥ing chicken on the stairs and it looks like a head so I shoot it, then it gives away where i am so i get hunted down like im a pokemon and their Ash ♥♥♥♥ing Ketchup. This is not a game this is a cult. It has the illusion of looking like a religion but its not. Its like scientology, a cult in the making that makes you pay to be a part of.
